title: Housing Development Finance Corporation Ltd soars 7.21% - Business Standard
content: Housing Development Finance Corporation Ltd soars 7.21%  Business Standard
description: Housing Development Finance Corporation Ltd is quoting at Rs 2629, up 7.21% on the day as on 12:49 IST on the NSE. The stock is up 7.49% in last one year as compared to a 22.39% spurt in NIFTY and a 17.32% spurt in the Nifty Financial Services.
